body_html: Just chiming in to say that I also experience heavy slowdowns using TF 0.10 RC0. In My case, the slowdown is even more severe: ~10x when using a ResNet-like architecture, on Python 3.5 using cuDNN 4 and CUDA 7.5.

body: Just chiming in to say that I also experience heavy slowdowns using TF 0.10 RC0. In My case, the slowdown is even more severe: ~10x when using a ResNet-like architecture, on Python 3.5 using cuDNN 4 and CUDA 7.5.
